column4: I converted my partition table from MBR to GPT using the gdisk utility. I converted the partition table back to MBR using gdisk and now both gparted and fdisk are incapable of finding my partitions. cfdisk gives the following error: FATAL ERROR: Bad primary partition 0: Partition ends in the final partial cylinder.
During the process of converting back to MBR I was asked to manually inpu
<chowder> t the hexcode corresponding to each partition and I foolishly went with the default assuming that everything was automagic. TL;DR How do I recover my partitions?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
